title: How can I set up Thunderbird mobile to display all emails in a threaded conversation view
creator: sin.pecado
content:
Hi,

I've been using Thunderbid Mobile from early beta but I've never managed to achieve what the desktop application (and many other applications) do out of the box: I want threaded views of an email conversation to display both sent and received emails (as well as those archived). I expected this to work out-of-the-box, but it has never worked and I've never been able to figure out how to tweak settings to make it work. I thought the unified view might allow what I want, but if I enable my "Inbox" and "Sent" (and Archive) folders to be unified I get a merged view of their content but the threaded view of emails does not work, I sent items separate from replies received to these.

I need help how to fix this because it has become severely limiting and it is pushing me to switch to another client if I can't find a solution.

Thanks, Szilard
